annotations:
Dear sirs,
Pls offer for
MV NOSTROMO                                         OPEN MUMBAI O/A 01 SEPT
Hyundai Vinashin blt 2012 Marshall Islands Flag
55,443m/t dwat on 12.868m
LOA 187.88 m Beam 32.26m
Grain Capacity 70,813.6 cu.m 5 H/H
holds co2 fitted / A60 bulkhead / Cement Holes / AHL
tpc 57.02 mt (summer draft)
Cr 4 x 35mt + Grabs
All dets 'abt'
ALT ETA ASF;
ETA FUJAIRAH O/A 05 SEPT
ETA SALALAH O/A 05 SEPT
ETA DURBAN O/A 15 SEPT
Best Regards
Sen
MARINE BIZ INTERNATIONAL – CHARTERING
INDIA
Mobile : +91 988 42 92 32 6
